name: Office Live Package
summary: Learn about .OLP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Microsoft Office Live was discontinued in 2012. Office Live Workspace was replaced by SkyDrive and Office Live Small Business was replaced by Office 365. Any websites using Office Live Small Business were removed when it was discontinued and are no longer recoverable.
NOTE: Currently, there is no known way to open the OLP file successfully.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
